rename.from: im getting this error even if my configuration is correct
rename.to: im getting this error even if my configuration is correct  ERROR    root                 <class 'Exception'>: Error when load config

body:
Hello Larrycoin,
Are you sure you have your config.json file inside the root folder of the program ? 
If yes, which version are you using ?
latest version  because I cloned it hours ago.
Are you sure you have your config.json file inside the root folder of the program ?

Hello,
It's also possible to have an Json syntax error in your config.json file, so please paste your file [here](https://jsonformatter.curiousconcept.com/) to check if your Json syntax is correct.

it is correct and I tested it there, I get this
![capture](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40338431/41530817-9bc29ec8-72f1-11e8-98dc-d5b4f675c6f7.PNG)

Ok so the only way to have this issue with a good Json file is that your config.json file is not in the root folder.
You should have : 
...
config/
evaluators/
tools/
trading/
...
CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
**config.json**
README.md
...
it is in the config folder
The config.json file has to be in the **root** folder (not in the config folder)
still same error, the  above error shows when  I try this python3 start.py -p install all
So you run *python3 start.py -p install all* in the **Octobot** folder with the config.json file in this folder ?
yes but I get those errors
I think the git has errors
to test, send me the one you used,
The one I use is based on **config/default_config.json** so you can copy this file in your Octobot's root folder an rename it as **config.json** to test a basic configuration.
I did that sir
Can you make a screenshot of your config.json please ?
![REMOVED](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40338431/41538075-98555898-730a-11e8-9443-e0e380b8e42f)

Ok I think you have a problem with your comma.
A Json comma is used to specify that the map is not ended.

So you have two errors : 
- In notification a comma is missing after **"type": []** : 
`"type": []`
becomes
`"type": [],`
- In notification in the end of "telegram" you have a comma after the "}" you should delete it
So you have :
```
"telegram" : {
        ...
},
```
Becomes
```
"telegram" : {
        ...
}
```
Without the ending comma
it's still giving the error. Ok I will try

You can use `git pull` to update your Octobot's repository to use the linked commit.
It will explain you what is the problem during config loading.
If you have no additional problem to raise, I will close the issue.
